title: Whale Enters Into Large ETH Position: Blockchain Tracking Firm
description:
A tweet published by the blockchain tracking firm Lookonchain shows that one particular whale entered into a long position for Ethereum (ETH) on Aave (AAVE) over the past week. According to the post, the whale deposited 6,000 staked Ethereum (stETH) on Aave to borrow 6 million Tether (USDT). The Whale then deposited the lump sum […]
